text: Oh I see very nice :+1: , I am good. Just a little busy  with my kid and uni work. Nearly finished modeling a simple robot  so I can rig it after. That's for my Rigging and creaturefx module.  Are you working on a lit of projects at the moment?
Usually we work on a single project for 3 or 4 months; right now it seems I'll be changing every couple of weeks as I moved to a more generalist-like position.
There's often a lot of work on a single project. Sometimes even a lot on a single shot.
